name: SmartRestaurant
0:
”alexa, open smart restaurant”
”can you bring me a glass of water”
”i will have spaghetti”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart restaurant
des:
An Alexa skill for a virtual smart restaurant.

Note that this skill is not for real. It is a simulation. It's a simple prototype (codename: "T1"). If a "smart restaurant" really existed, then you'd use a skill like this to order food, etc. Use this for your amusement only.

Currently, it provides a very limited set of functions:
* You can ask about today's special.
* You can order water or drink.
* You can order a food/main dish.
* You can order a dessert.
* You can ask for the check.
* You can tell the server how the food was.

Please let us know if you have any questions or suggestions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
